evelution-theme: Labal that appears on each item on the theme selection dropdown.
evelution-themes: Tooltip label used for the themes dropdown.
evelution-explore: Tooltip label used for the explore dropdown.
evelution-togglesize: Tooltip label used for toggling article width and rail visibility.
evelution-togglecolor: Tooltip label used for toggling the color mode between solo and duo.
evelution-newfiles: Tooltip label used for the new files link.
evelution-darkmode: Tooltip label used for switching to Dark mode.
evelution-lightmode: Tooltip label used for switching to Light mode.
evelution-variants: Tooltip label used for the language variants dropdown.
evelution-support: Tooltip label used for the support server link.
evelution-documentation: Tooltip label used for the documentation link.
evelution-standard: Label for the standard visual style and color pack.
evelution-visual-styles: Tooltip label used for the visual styles dropdown.
evelution-visual-colors: Tooltip label used for the visual colors dropdown.
evelution-activity-module:
{{notranslate}}
This message contains the required wikitext to embed Special:RecentChanges.
evelution-about-module-info:
{{notranslate}}
This message contains info about the wiki.
evelution-style-basic: Label used for the basic visual style.
evelution-style-contrast: Label used for the high contrast visual style.
evelution-style-simple: Label used for the simple visual style.
evelution-style-classic: Label used for the classic visual style.
